verses.roman:
svarūpa-gosāñi kaḍacāya ye-līlā likhila
raghunātha-dāsa-mukhe ye saba śunila

synonyms: svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; kaḍacāya—in his notes; ye—whatever; līlā—pastimes; likhila—has noted; raghunātha-dāsa-mukhe—from the mouth of Raghunātha dāsa Gosvāmī; ye—that; saba—all; śunila—I have heard.
translation: I have heard from the mouth of Raghunātha dāsa Gosvāmī all that Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī recorded in his notes about the pastimes of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
